description: Checks a disk partition and maintains configurable threshold states green, yellow and red. Sends a message with the following properties set: total, used, free, used_percent, free_percent. The message is sent to the corresponding outputs dependent on the state.

properties.name: partition
properties.label: Partition Name
properties.description: Provide the name of the partition. Default is the partition of the router's working directory

properties.name: dimension
properties.label: Dimension
properties.description: Provide dimension of the disk space to report.

properties.name: threshold-yellow
properties.label: Threshold Yellow
properties.description: Provide the threshold in percent of used space to reach yellow state.

properties.name: threshold-red
properties.label: Threshold Red
properties.description: Provide the threshold in percent of used space to reach red state.
